code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{connect}from'react-redux';function SingleUser(props){return React.createElement("div",null,props.user&&props.postsByUser&&React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("h2",null,"USER NAME: ",props.user.name),React.createElement("h3",null,"POSTS WRITTEN BY USER"),React.createElement("ul",null,props.postsByUser.map(function(post){return React.createElement("li",{key:post.id},React.createElement(Link,{to:"/posts/".concat(post.id)},post.title));}))));}var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state,props){var id=props.match.params.id;return{user:state.users.find(function(user){return user.id==id;}),postsByUser:state.posts.filter(function(post){return post.userId==id;})};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(SingleUser);
